global.description: - wrong alert message when user click enter button in contact searching page
- Message logs within the CRM are now consistently displayed in chronological order
- Ringtone can now be set up in Audio settings
- Improve user settings presentation
- AI notes are now attached when doing retroactive call logging
- Freskdesk and Gohighlevel are now supported
- Insightly has new setting in Insightly options to input custom phone field names
- Click-to-dial enablement is now controled by user settings with 4 modes. (previous whitelist is deprecated)
- Notification-level setting to control what types of notification would be shown
- DisableRetroCallLogging in user setting is changed to EnableRetroCallLogging
- Contacts are shown with source icon
- An issue when opening contact page
- An issue when getting user settings
- Quick access button and click-to-dial can be configured to be shown on other pages rather than CRM page. Set it up in user settings -> general -> allowed pages
- Contact search in call/message log page to add contact searched by name
- Include tab visibility control in Admin settings
- Call session id can now be included in call log notes. This can be turned ON/OFF in user settings
- Developer mode can be turned ON before connecting to CRM
- User setting now shows correct connect status right after open
- Call queue calls cannot be logged in a few cases
- Fax log support
- If user is admin, '(Admin)' will be shown after user name on user setting page
- Show 'Cannot find call log' and 'Cannot find contact' even when contact is known
- Contact call-pop for known contact
- Server-side call logging support using user credentials if possible
- Server-side call logging new selection for logging by Agent/User (if possible) OR Admin
- 'Tabs' setting is renamed as 'Customize tabs' and is moved under 'General' setting
- Call queue not answered cannot be logged
- Server side call logging for all platforms
- One-time log in user setting to reduce Rate Limit issue and make logging more stable
- Hide or show tabs in user settings
- Call queue presence setting
- Display voicemail transcript
- Google Sheets is now supported
- Auto-logging happens right after call is connected (unless one-time log is ON)
- Multiple matched contact handling
- New users cannot save auto log setting
- Randomly dial previous number
- User settings for ai related features (applicable accounts only)
- User settings are kept after logout and auto-loaded after re-connect
- Token refresh lock to reduce issues of invalid authorization
- Clearer sign on case where auto call log setting disabled by Server Side Call Logging
- Agent note title inserted in log description when there's no note
- Fix spamming of contact not found warning notification
- Fix contact match issue on multiple contact case
- Contact match timeout issue
- Auto log in user setting isn't set unless reloaded
- Timeout issue (mostly affecting call logging)
- Admin users now get admin setting right after login
- A new setting to turn ON/OFF retroactive call logging
- Retro call logging now has recording link if applicable, instead of showing '(pending...)'
- User settings are synced more frequently and stably
- Some settings now have additional explanations of how it works
- 'Call log details' setting is now under 'Call and SMS logging'
Error messages are more accurate
More accurate call info, including better tracking on call recording link save status
Call info details can be selectively logged based on new toggles in user settings
(RingCentral AI license only) Smart Notes to be enabled in user advanced settings
Admin users can see admin tab on first login now
- This extension's name is now changed to RingCentral App Connect
- (for Clio and Insightly user only) Overriding phone number format missing issue
- Auto pop up log page after call setting not working
- Inbound call contact pop not working
- Admin icon in dark theme
- User setting inside call pop to control behavior of multiple matched contacts (disabled, all open, prompt to select)
- SMS logging issue
- Auto open extension now only opens when main page is opened
- (Only for admin users) Admin tools. Admins have an extra tab in the extension to control end users' settings
- SMS logging date format
- SMS log issue
- Missing recording link when doing retroactive auto call logging
- Auto log association
- User setting in advanced features to turn on 'Auto open extension' to open itself when opening a CRM page
- Auto pop up log page is not dependent on auto log setting anymore
- Call/SMS logging issue
- Show error page when CRM initialization fails
- Use local cached contact info to avoid rate limit issue
- Auto call log now supports retrospectively logging up to 100 unlogged records upon extension open
- Unreolved tab is removed now. To check out unlogged calls, there's now a filter on call history page
- Updated notification UI
- Numbers can now be copied from call page and call history page
- Click-to-dial now supports detecting phone numbers in input fields
- Click-to-dial now supports detecting extension numbers with format as eg. +13334445555#134
- Call history page now has a search bar with filters
- Contact pop settings now support both inbound and outbound calls on different timings
- RingCentral team message is added as a new tab (might get delayed to show up)
- More historical call records can be viewed from call history page with 'Load more' button
- Incoming call pop contact page fixed
- User settings are organized in a better way
- Support page is added to user settings
- Community forum is created, can be accessed via support page -> 'Get support'
- SMS template remembers orders after close
- An About page in user settings to show info and helper links
- Factor reset now also cleans up unresolved conflicts
- SMS template supports drag and drop to arrange item orders
- Use SMS template that syncs with RingCentral App's SMS template
- Show notification when a call recording link is uploaded
- SMS template cannot apply issue
- Factory Reset button in user settings
- RingCentral sign in issue where pop up sign in window is stuck at loading screen
- Auto log conflict messages now contain more meaningful info
- Auto log with conflict resolver
- Manual refersh contact info with button
- Audio volume controls
- SMS messages are now logged as in conversations per day
- New UIs
https://ringcentral.github.io/rc-unified-crm-extension/release-notes/
